reviewText: If you've gotten this far with the series then you know how good it is and you don't need a review.  Watch it and simplt enjoy the ride.

Silly. Funny as all get out. Grown up. Action packed. Some of the coolest fighting scenes ever. I continue to love this series. I recommend it.
Can I have all of your condiments please?

UPDATE: I have the whole series now and have watched it a couple of times all the way through. I love it! It is one of my favorite anime series.
